home.toggle_container: Control panel for adjusting time format, view mode, and displaying active downloads.
home.collection_stats: Overview of your media collection, including total movies, TV shows, episodes, and system uptime.
home.recently_aired: Shows episodes that have aired recently.
home.airing_soon: Upcoming episodes scheduled to air in the near future.
home.upcoming_releases: New movies or shows expected to be released soon.
home.recently_added_movies: Latest movies added to your collection.
home.recently_added_shows: Latest TV shows added to your collection.
